Features 16 beautiful tracks from the game!


01. A Requiem for Innocence - Adrien Byrne & Gao (5:12)
02. Serie de Fragmento (English Ver.) - Adrien Byrne & Gao (5:27)
03. Dance and Stamp and Cheer - Gao (2:29)
04. The Crack of Dawn - Gao (4:40)
05. He Loves You - Gao (3:15)
06. Little Swallow - Gao (3:36)
07. A Place to Call Home - Cocoro Mashima (4:26)
08. Chitty-Chatty Ceren - Cocoro Mashima (3:34)
09. Bright Futures - Cocoro Mashima (3:52)
10. Song for the Sunrise - Cocoro Mashima (3:43)
11. Days Long Past - Cocoro Mashima (4:58)
12. Seething Darkness - Cocoro Mashima (3:35)
13. Left Behind - Cocoro Mashima (3:49)
